oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Programmable gain amplifiers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RATHORE, TS
JAIN, LC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: amplifiers
programmable circuits
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various types of programmable gain amplifiers (PGAs) are presented. A minimal PGA theorem is presented. 26 minimal PGAs each for inverting, buffered attenuator and non-inverting types can be derived using minimal programmable resistors. A PGA that can program any set of arbitrary gains is given, Two PGAs for programming gains of dual polarity and a PGA with dual polarity outputs are also included.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE INSTITUTION OF ELECTRONICS AND TELECOMMUNICATION ENGINEERS, 42(2), 97-97
